pkgmetadata.longdescription: Waiting List Metrics Using Queuing Theory // Waiting list management using queuing theory to analyse, predict and manage queues, based on the approach described in Fong et al. (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.08.23.22279117. Aimed at UK National Health Service (NHS) applications, waiting list summary statistics, target-value calculations, waiting list simulation, and scheduling functions are included.
